data.name: Name of planner
data.duration: Duration: How many hours (empty to create a config entity)
data.accept_cost: Accept cost: Accept if average below (empty to create a config entity)
data.accept_rate: Accept rate: Accept if average rate below (empty to create a config entity)

data.search_length: Search length: How far in the future (empty to create a config entity)

data.end_time: End time: At what latest hour to complete (empty to create a config entity)

abort.already_configured: Already configured with the same settings or name
